title: [Site Update] Embedded media in discussions!
body:
Greetings Summoners! We just rolled out a feature that will allow you to embed images and videos in-line in your discussions. We previously had some of this functionality (but it was a bit buggy), the issues should be fixed now. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AkNYbj_Wvks

To try it yourself, just include the URL of your image or video and it will show up in your discussion!

replies.body:
http://31.media.tumblr.com/ec49c99bea0aa01ce0006b13a9eaa0d6/tumblr_n1do2cehSp1skstylo1_1280.gif

We also squashed some bugs with images in comments too! Let us know what you think!
